Name: autoimmune thrombocytopenic purpura
Definition: A primary thrombocytopenia that involves relatively few platelets in blood as a result of autoantibodies.

Name: Evans' syndrome
Definition: A specific developmental disorder that involves difficulty in scholastic skills such as reading

Name: obsolete herpes zoster iridocyclitis
Definition: An ophthalmic herpes zoster that results_in inflammation located_in iris and located_in ciliary body
